markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Earthquakes](/Rules.aspx?ID=650)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 518 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Earthquakes often cause other natural disasters in the form of avalanches, collapses, floods, and tsunamis, but they also present unique threats such as fissures, soil liquefaction, and tremors.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-651" />

<document level="2" id="rules-652" />

<document level="2" id="rules-653" />
name: Earthquakes

text: Earthquakes Source Core Rulebook pg. 518 4.0 Earthquakes often cause other natural disasters in the form of avalanches, collapses, floods, and tsunamis, but they also present unique threats such as fissures, soil liquefaction, and tremors.
